name: drunkenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a drunken (= under the influence of alcohol) way: He staggered drunkenly towards the door. He lurched drunkenly to his feet. See
drunken
More examplesFewer examples"What are those for?" Mike asked drunkenly. She wandered drunkenly into town and used abusive language.He arrived to find one of the crew slumped drunkenly over the wheel.
